task_001.title: Research YouTube branding guidelines
task_001.description: Study YouTube visual identity, color schemes, and iconography to ensure authentic YouTube-themed design

task_002.title: Design YouTube-themed logo
task_002.description: Create a new logo incorporating YouTube play button aesthetic with YTM branding, maintaining red color scheme

task_003.title: Create video content icons
task_003.description: Design icons for video upload, audio processing, language selection, and content creation workflows

task_004.title: Design file type indicators
task_004.description: Create specific icons for different file types (voice, background, video) with YouTube styling

task_005.title: Implement new logo system
task_005.description: Replace simple Y logo with new YouTube-themed design in Navigation component

task_006.title: Update navigation icons
task_006.description: Replace current navigation icons with YouTube-appropriate alternatives (Video, Activity, etc.)

task_007.title: Enhance feature section icons
task_007.description: Update feature section with video/content creation themed icons and animations

task_008.title: Create icon component library
task_008.description: Build reusable icon system for new YouTube-themed icons with proper TypeScript types

task_009.title: Update file upload interface
task_009.description: Implement new file type icons in FileUpload component with YouTube styling

task_010.title: Coordinate icon enhancement project
task_010.description: Manage overall project timeline, dependencies, and ensure smooth handoffs between agents

task_011.title: Review and test icon integration
task_011.description: Ensure all icons work properly across screen sizes, themes, and accessibility standards

task_012.title: Create icon usage guidelines
task_012.description: Document how to use the new icon system and maintain consistency across the application
